_source.short_desc: Novi was created and designed by associations who wanted the power and flexibility of custom software without the custom price.
_source.long_desc: Novi was created and designed by associations, end users just like you, who wanted the power and flexibility of custom software without the custom price. The result is association management software that staff quickly adopts and is excited to log in to every day. With an intuitive user experience, combined with our 24/7, two-way sync with QuickBooks, Novi AMS removes workarounds and automates manual tasks so that staff can focus on serving members and growing the organization.
_source.pricing_details: Our pricing is transparent and upfront. We scale our pricing based on the association's annual revenue. No matter the tier, all Novi customers receive the same access to functionality. Our goal is to help grow your organization's reach. Ultimately, as you grow, we grow.
_source.target_audience: Novi AMS is particularly well suited for associations using QuickBooks.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Association management software designed for self-managed condominiums, homeowners associations and other planned communities.
related_products.features: Buildium is purpose-built for all types of residential property management and is trusted by over 4,000 professional association managers with over 300,000 association units. Whether you manage rental properties, condominiums, or homeowners associations, Buildium is an all-in-one solution that helps you improve communication, increase operational efficiency, and maximize financial resources.

related_products.short_desc: Community association managers use AppFolio to save time and money, improve communications, and grow their business.
related_products.features: With just one association management solution, equip your team with tools that streamline the work -- from mobile violations, association accounting, and more. With online portals and numerous communication methods, you'll exceed homeowner expectations. AppFolio's reliable tech foundation enables you to effectively manage and grow your business. Experience a true tech partnership with AppFolio's expert onboarding and on-demand service.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline chapter management,  membership dues, email marketing, website design & more. Try a Demo!
related_products.features:
---- TRY OUR 7-DAY FREE TRIAL:
https://www.brilliantdirectories.com/trial  ----

Brilliant Directories offers an Affordable, All-In-One Member Management Solution to streamline all aspects of your membership website or association.  A complete, turn-key solution with quick setup and free, unlimited support from real people. Includes website design, online payment processing, multi-level memberships, past due monitoring, premium member's only content, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free association management software. Cloud, mobile, open source. Over 8 million clients
related_products.features: Over 8 million groups use Bitrix24 as free AMS (association management software) thanks to over 35+ tools available to clubs, alumni, non-profits, interest groups, chambers of commerce, online communities and other types of associations. Private social network is the heart of Bitrix24. That's where discussions happened, decisions are made and ideas are shared.

related_products.short_desc: Association Management Software for board volunteers who want to save time and money!
related_products.features: Board volunteers of local association chapters save time and money with StarChapter! The software combines emails, event registration, membership, website design, and payment processing all in one place. A StarChapter Project Manager will set up your service with you, coordinate the project for you, and train users even when the board transitions. Customers get access to 24/7 online technical support and unlimited industry and training resources.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage your members, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more.
related_products.features: WildApricot is a complete membership management system, designed to fit your associations needs. Easily manage your contacts, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more. With a self serve design and a user friendly interface, you have the freedom to customize every aspect of your association management system. If you need help at any step of the way, our support team and community of experts are ready to help guide you and share their best practices.

related_products.short_desc: Increase engagement & drive revenue with Neon Membership, an all-in-one membership management solution designed for associations.
related_products.features: Increase engagement and drive more revenue with Neon Membership, a sophisticated all-in-one membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits and associations. Help staff and volunteers quickly engage members with built-in: email, marketing, event management, and reporting features. Member management software made easy - with trusted partners like QuickBooks, Constant Contact, and MailChimp.

related_products.short_desc: Offers advantages to clubs and associations of every size with an individual web site, membership database, and more.
related_products.features: ClubExpress is the economical Internet-based solution for smaller professional and trade associations (25-5000 members). ClubExpress combines your association web site with the membership database, online member signups/renewals/expirations, event calendar & registration, credit-card processing, membership directory, committees, forums, documents, interests, benefits, etc. We use state-of-the-art security, there's no advertising and associations own their data at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Over 3,000 associations, chambers, and AMCs trust MemberClicks to manage their organization and grow membership and revenue.
related_products.features:
Simplify membership management with MemberClicks; an all-in-one AMS solution helping your association save time and engage your members. Make use of powerful features to manage your finances, marketing, events, and membership management.  

Our AMS platform is supported by an unrivaled customer support team committed to seeing your association succeed.

Today, over 3,000 clients in North America trust MemberClicks to fulfil their missions.

related_products.short_desc: memberplanet simplifies membership and makes it easy to grow your association.
related_products.features: Every association is unique, which is why memberplanet offers dynamic solutions for associations regardless of size. The platform provides benefits for each level of your association, from enterprise-level functionality for administrative staff to self-service tools for members. The national level can gain transparency over all aspects of chapters' activities through aggregate reporting. Intuitive features minimize the learning curve during staff transitions and encourage easy adoption.

similar_products.short_desc: Retain, engage, and grow your member community with a software that automates your membership processes and maximizes retention.
similar_products.features:
Associations all around the world are increasing their engagement rates, automating their processes, increasing
renewals and growing their member base with Glue Up. This all-in-one solution comes equipped with an ecosystem of modules and is designed to make all your membership management processes simple and efficient. Powered by a robust CRM, Glue Up offers membership and event management, email marketing, invoicing and payments, mobile apps, community, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Association management software designed for self-managed condominiums, homeowners associations and other planned communities.
similar_products.features: Buildium is purpose-built for all types of residential property management and is trusted by over 4,000 professional association managers with over 300,000 association units. Whether you manage rental properties, condominiums, or homeowners associations, Buildium is an all-in-one solution that helps you improve communication, increase operational efficiency, and maximize financial resources.

similar_products.short_desc: YourMembership is an affordable, all-in-one association management software built for small to mid-sized associations and nonprofits.
similar_products.features: YourMembership empowers associations to deliver more value to their constituents while streamlining administrative processes. Built for small to mid-sized associations, the cloud-based association management software is a comprehensive solution including: membership management, event management, content management tools, email marketing, online community and advanced dashboards.

similar_products.short_desc: Nimble AMS helps you manage every aspect of your association while leveraging the power of the #1 CRM platform, Salesforce.
similar_products.features: Nimble AMS by Community Brands helps you manage every aspect of your association while leveraging the power of the #1 CRM platform, Salesforce. From creating and managing a stellar membership experience to processing orders, managing events, and analyzing your organization's data, Nimble AMS helps your entire team succeed. Learn more at nimbleams.com. Leverage the power of Salesforce to take your association to the next level. Learn more at nimbleams.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline financial processes and demonstrate accountability with Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT's complete fund accounting system.
similar_products.features: Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT?? delivers intuitive cloud fund accounting software designed specifically to meet the needs of nonprofits and tax-exempt organizations. Its advanced technology with powerful reporting tools helps your accounting team drive efficiency and financial stewardship while enabling you to seamlessly manage transactions, eliminate manual processes, and securely share information instantly. Track and report financial activity from any device, anywhere with 24/7 accessibility.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlock the potential of your community with the most flexible and powerful solution for association management and engagement.
similar_products.features: Unlock the potential of your association with Hivebrite, the most advanced all-in-one community management and engagement platform. Easy to set up and fully branded to match your colors, Hivebrite helps you build brand engagement and create opportunities for your association. Manage your member database, centralize the communication with your members, create events and collect online payments, all from a single user-friendly interface.

similar_products.short_desc: Grow your Membership Faster with Smarter Association Software. Keep Members Engaged. Keep Members Longer. Trusted by 3,200 associations
similar_products.features: Drive Growth with Smarter Association Software featuring a full AMS with built-in marketing automation and member prospecting. Built for mid-to-large organizations rather than volunteer-based associations. Well suited for Trade and Professional Associations as well as Chambers of Commerce. Grow and retain membership, generate revenue, engage and communicate with members and prospects, & streamline day-to-day operations.

All-in-one membership management software that automates member applications & renewals, email communication, events, CRM and more. 

Automate busy work to spend less time managing member data, and more time understanding member needs.  

Member365 is used to manage your contacts, membership, events, email marketing, committees, continuing education and online training, job board, storefront and much more!

similar_products.short_desc: SaaS solution that provides an organization with a member database, website content  tools, online event registration, and much more!
similar_products.features: Our affordable and easy to use software can streamline your member-based organization's administrative processes; retain and grow your membership; and generate revenue. Our intuitive association management features can help you track dues; communicate and engage with members and prospects; update your website; host in-person events and virtual events with our Zoom interface; conduct calls for proposals; track donations; integrate with QuickBooks; manage committees; and more. Try a free demo!

similar_products.short_desc: Community association managers use AppFolio to save time and money, improve communications, and grow their business.
similar_products.features: With just one association management solution, equip your team with tools that streamline the work -- from mobile violations, association accounting, and more. With online portals and numerous communication methods, you'll exceed homeowner expectations. AppFolio's reliable tech foundation enables you to effectively manage and grow your business. Experience a true tech partnership with AppFolio's expert onboarding and on-demand service.

similar_products.short_desc: SmartRec by Amilia is the smartest and easiest way to offer, manage, and sell activities. Engage communities online effortlessly.
similar_products.features:
Amilia SmartRec empowers businesses, community organizations and Parks & Recreation agencies to better serve their community with activities.  

We make it easy for your community to find, register and pay for activities online. You'll save time and get to do more of what you love - it's eCommerce for activities!  

When your registration process is simple and effortlessly accessed by your community, you'll generate even more engagement. Not to mention, you'll see a huge bump in signups.

similar_products.short_desc: Provides a complete solution for effectively managing organizations including virtual meetings & webinars via Zoom and other API's.
similar_products.features: Association Catalyst is more than just Association Management Software! It is a single platform completely integrating your association database and member activities with your website management. Association Catalyst streamlines both front end and back-office operations. Members can easily enroll, renew, register & pay for events, update profiles, and attend  virtual events, courses and meetings online via our xCatalyst LMS and webinar API integration with Zoom, GoToTraining and others.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Alumni Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Alumni Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Alumni Management software provides educational institutions and other fundraising organizations with tools to cultivate and stay connected with alumni. Database management, email campaigns, alumni social network software, donation software, and event registration are usually integrated into this type of software. By automating alumni communication and solicitation, organizations can quickly and more effectively reach out to constituents. Alumni Management software is related to Fundraising software, Association Management software, School Administration software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top HOA software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of HOA tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: HOA software, or Homeowners Association software, is designed for the particular needs of single-family home developments, condominiums (Condos), and other similar communities and homeowner associations with features similar to Property Management and Fund Accounting software. Standard features include the ability to track information about homeowners and condo association participants, create community forums, and manage member meetings. HOA software is related to Membership Management software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.
